DIRECT  ENTRY  
AUE accepts 'A’ level passes NCE pass in 
Economics or Business Management and one 
(1) other subject,ND upper credit in Business 
Administration plus UTME requirements.  
  
UTME  
(i) AUE accepts five (5) 'O’ level credit passes 
obtained at not more than two (2) sittings in 
relevant subjects to include English Language,  
Government, Mathematics and any other two  
(2)Social Science subjects.  
(ii) FED-LOKOJA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit  
passes including English Language, Government 
or History, and any other three (3) subject from 
Arts or Social Sciences.  
(iii) FED-WUKARI – Same as in Economics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) AUE accepts Mathematics, Government and any 
other Social Science subject.  
(ii) FED-LOKOJA accepts History/Government plus 
one (1)Social Science subject and any other Arts 
or Social Science subject.  
  
PSYCHOLOGY  
COVENANT  
EVANGEL 
PLASU

subjects from Arts, Social 
Sciences or Sciences as

subjects
